typeMetadata.name: Custom Event
typeMetadata.description: Triggered when a custom event is pushed to the Data-Layer.
typeMetadata.help: Allows developers to define manually when this trigger should be triggered by pushing an event to the Data-Layer. This way you can for example execute certain actions when a product is added to the cart, or when a user logs in.

row.name: eventName
row.title: Event Name
row.description: The name of the event that is pushed to the Data-Layer. For example you can push an event by adding this to your website: _mtm.push({"event": "my-custom-event"});
